refnamediv.refpurpose: parse XML to a representation in the ATerm format

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: parse-xml-info parses an XML document to xml-info, a DOM like representation of an XML document in the ATerm format. It supports two parsers: the default JAXP parser of a Java 2 Runtime Environment or the SGLR parser with a parse table generated from an SDF2 syntax definition for XML.
